page.title: 05RECREATION KING'S STANLEY
page.content: There are few leisure facilities in the village;cricket and football are played on the Recreation Ground.There is one pub in the village with a Skittle Alley.The village has a video-tape library.Several groups use the Village Hall for leisure pastimes and private functions are held there regularly.For the children, swings and a slide are provided on the Recreation Ground.Many people spend their time gardening and walking in this beautiful part of Gloucestershire. HANG-GLIDERS can often be seen when the wind is in the right direction. The people who fly on the hang-gliders meet on the edge of Selsley Common above the village and come from many miles around because the air-currents are right for the sport.A hang-glider is a large sail on a light-weight frame which supports one person.
